mapper.sql: uid, uname, sex, address, pwd, utype, tel, age, mbanswer, question, email, pubtime, tname, isdel
mapper.insert: insert into sysuser (uid, uname, sex, address, pwd, utype, tel, age, mbanswer, question, email, pubtime, tname, isdel) values (#{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{uname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{utype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{age,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mbanswer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{question,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pubtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isdel,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update sysuser
uname = #{uname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sex = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pwd = #{pwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
utype = #{utype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
age = #{age,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pubtime = #{pubtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tname = #{tname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
isdel = #{isdel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update sysuser set uname = #{uname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pwd = #{pwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, utype = #{utype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, age = #{age,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mbanswer = #{mbanswer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, question = #{question,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pubtime = #{pubtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tname = #{tname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, isdel = #{isdel,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from sysuser where uname = #{uname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and isdel="1"

select count(*) from sysuser where isdel="1"
and utype =#{utype}

select * from sysuser where isdel="1"
and utype =#{utype}
